name: Operators
description: Automatic or live assistance to a consumer to arrange for billing or completion of a telephone call, busy line verification, emergency interrupt, and operator-assisted directory assistance services.

name: Computer Repair
description: Identification, troubleshooting and resolving problems and issues in a faulty computer.  Repair of computer hardware, software or network/Internet problems.

name: Corporate Law Attorney
description: Information on people rights, responsibilities, and duties under the law. Representation of the corporate entity at courts and negotiations.

name: Notarization
description: Public services in non-contentious matters usually concerned with general financial transactions, estates, deeds, powers-of-attorney, and foreign and international business

name: Events
description: Provision of artwork support in respect of events, includes related Logistics Services and associated services in relation to an event

name: Event Security
description: Safety guards to provide safety and protection of all attendees at events including concerts, sporting events, conferences, and private gatherings

name: Accounting
description: Measurement, processing and communication of financial information about economic entities including, financial accounting, management accounting, auditing, auditing services, taxation and accounting information systems etc..

name: Technology & Engineering
description: Project-based's technology and engineering services, helping clients bring products or technology to market.

name: Architecture
description: Design, preparation of construction documents, and construction administration, feasibility studies, architectural programming and project management.

name: Carpentry
description: Cutting, shaping and installation of building materials during the construction of buildings, ships, timber bridges, concrete formwork, etc.

name: Handyman Services
description: Maintenance worker, repaire worker, keeping buildings, shops or equipment around the home in good repair.

name: Cleaning Services
description: Hand washing, dry cleaning machine, Ultrasonic parts cleaning, Carbon dioxide, snow cleaning in an aerospace setting

name: Software Development
description: Computer programming, design, code development and maintenance, implementation, support, testing, and documentation services and other services

name: Real Estate
description: Service provision with respect to the purchase, sale, lease, rental, or appraisal of real property
